latest_news.title: Rare Migratory Bird Spotted
latest_news.description: A rare Siberian species was seen near the wetlands.
latest_news.summary: Birdwatchers are flocking to the local wetlands after a confirmed sighting of the elusive Siberian Crane.

latest_news.title: Climate Impact on Birds
latest_news.summary: New studies suggest rising global temperatures are forcing migratory birds to change their traditional paths.
